betterquesting:10.desc:8:
As you may have noticed, §2Charcoal§f cannot be made in an §2Furnace§f, you need to make it in an §2Coke Oven§f.

The §2Coke Oven§f§f is the first Multiblock you can make in this Pack, it's 3x3x3 and hollow in the middle.

It's the early way of obtaining §2Charcoal§f and gives as byproduct§2 Creosote§f, which can be used to make §2Treated Wood§f that will become handy later on.

The §2Hatches§f allow for basic automation with hoppers, pipes, etc. They can output both §2Creosote §fand §2Charcoal§f and allow inputting §2Wood§f.

It also accepts §2Coal§f, and will output an more powerful fuel called §2Coke§f!
